keyword: calories in a corona extra beer
title: Calories in a Corona Extra Beer
meta_description: Discover calories in a Corona Extra beer (12 oz bottle), including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations like light versions.
h1: Calories in a Corona Extra Beer
assumptions: Standard 12 oz (355 ml) bottle of Corona Extra lager, chilled, no added lime or salt.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and any additions like lime or salt; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Corona Extra beer contains about 148 kcal and 13.9 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Pour into a salt-rimmed glass (added salt only)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Corona Extra beer?
What are the carbs in Corona Extra?
faqs.a: Approximately 13.9 g carbs per beer, mostly from malt.

faqs.q: Does Corona Extra have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 1.2 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: Is Corona Extra low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 25 mg sodium per 12 oz beer.

faqs.q: How does Corona Extra compare to other beers calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar to many light lagers but higher than ultra-low-cal options like Michelob Ultra (95 kcal).
